Deluxe Fumiture a division of Minaye Pvt. Ltd. Co. has been in business since January of 2003. We specialize in fine collections of office furniture, home furniture and Safe box. Our products are handpicked from the best furniture makers around the world. We provide products in variety of woods and textures. Our products are designed to appeal to range of consumer tastes in premium segment and cover all style categories, including continental, contemporary, traditional and more. Deluxe also specializes in custom made Vertical Blinds with various color and style of your choice. Deluxe is proud to offer breathtaking style, astonishing quality and outstanding customer service - at affordable, down-to- the-earth prices.Our Customers include Govermmental and non-Govemmentaloffices, Embassies, Banks, Universities as well as PLCs andPrivate individuals.
